attributes.action: Create an Internet Pay Per View System for UK TV programmes for people living abroad
attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned would like the Internet block, currently put on UK TV programmes being shown abroad, removed. I have tried to watch TV programmes via BBC, CH4 and ITV iPlayers and been refused access, It is accepted that as people abroad do not pay a UK licence fee then they should pay to watch those programmes. As an example, £1 for half hour programme, £2 for one hour programme, £3 for a feature length programme. This could be done by adding a Credit Card payment option to the various iPlayers. The BBC iPlayer would be an obvious choice for a trial.
